Detailed Description

Execute a command line.

Execution constructor. Execute command when creating object.

Parameters:
lpExePath  IN: executable file path
lpParameters  IN: parameters
nShow  IN: execute window state
bWait  IN: wait for execution over
dwWaitTime  IN: if wait, set the max waitting time

LPCTSTR  lpParameters = NULL,
int  nShow = SW_SHOW,

)

Execute command.

Returns:
true, if creating process successfully. Otherwise false.
Parameters:

lpParameters  IN: parameters
nShow  IN: execute window state
bWait  IN: wait for execution over
